content: round 4 single_crochet increase x6 =18st round 5 18sc =18st round 6 single_crochet increase x9 =27st round 7 incx27 =54st change to light blue yarn round 8 slip_stitch ch1 x27 =54st f o and weave in the yarn tail assembly 1 sew the wrapper sides on both sides of the eye along the back loops of round 2 over round 10-12 of the eye 2 using red embroidery thread embroider branching veins over the eyes from the back towards the front of the eye over round 8 -21
